Please provide a valid hex code (e.g., `#FF0000`) or dye name (e.g., `Dalamud Red`).

errors.noDyesAvailable: No dyes available in the database.

manual.title: XIV Dye Tools Manual
manual.welcome: Welcome to **XIV Dye Tools**! This bot helps you explore and match FFXIV dye colors.
manual.commandsIntro: Below you'll find all available commands organized by category.
manual.autocompleteNote: All commands support **autocomplete** for dye names!

match.name: `/match <color> [count]`
match.description:
Find the closest FFXIV dye to any color.
â€¢ Accepts hex codes (`#FF0000`) or dye names
â€¢ Optional: show up to 10 closest matches

harmony.name: `/harmony <color> [type]`
harmony.description:
Generate harmonious dye combinations.
â€¢ Types: Complementary, Analogous, Triadic, Split-Complementary, Tetradic, Square, Monochromatic
â€¢ Creates a visual color wheel

mixer.name: `/mixer <start> <end> [steps]`
mixer.description:
Create a color gradient between two colors.
â€¢ Shows matched dyes for each gradient step
â€¢ Configurable step count (2-10)

dyeSearch.name: `/dye search <query>`
dyeSearch.description:
Search for dyes by name.
â€¢ Fuzzy matching finds partial matches
â€¢ Shows hex codes and categories

dyeInfo.name: `/dye info <name>`
dyeInfo.description:
Get detailed information about a specific dye.
â€¢ Shows hex, RGB, HSV values
â€¢ Displays category and item ID

dyeList.name: `/dye list [category]`
dyeList.description:
List all dyes or filter by category.
â€¢ Categories: Reds, Browns, Yellows, Greens, Blues, Purples, Neutral, Special

dyeRandom.name: `/dye random [unique_categories]`
dyeRandom.description:
Show 5 randomly selected dyes.
â€¢ Option to limit to 1 dye per category

about.name: `/about`
about.description: Show bot information, version, and links.

tips.autocomplete: **Autocomplete:** Start typing a dye name and suggestions will appear!
tips.hexColors: **Hex Colors:** Use standard web format like `#FF0000` (red) or `#5865F2` (blurple)
tips.dyeNames: **Dye Names:** Type partial names - "dala" will find "Dalamud Red"
tips.facewearExcluded: **Facewear Excluded:** Generic Facewear dyes (like "Red", "Blue") are excluded from results

list.noDyesInCategory: No dyes found in the "{category}" category.
list.useListHint: Use /dye list <category> to see dyes in a category

random.title: Random Dyes
random.descriptionUnique: Here are {count} randomly selected dyes, one from each category:

accessibility.title: Color Vision Accessibility
accessibility.protanopiaDesc: Reduced sensitivity to red light (~1% of males)
accessibility.deuteranopiaDesc: Reduced sensitivity to green light (~1% of males)
accessibility.description: This visualization shows how the dye appears to people with different types of color vision deficiency:
accessibility.matrixDescription: The matrix shows WCAG contrast ratios between each pair of dyes:

favorites.empty: You don't have any favorite dyes yet.
favorites.limitReached:
You've reached the maximum of {max} favorites.

Remove one with `/favorites remove` first.

Use `/collection delete` to remove one first.

about.title: XIV Dye Tools Bot
about.description: A Discord bot for FFXIV dye color exploration and matching.

matchImage.missingImage: Please attach an image to analyze.
matchImage.invalidAttachment: Could not find the attached image.
matchImage.noColors: The image appears to be fully transparent or too small to analyze.
matchImage.extractionFailed: Could not extract colors from the image.
matchImage.processingFailed: An error occurred while processing the image.
matchImage.onlyDiscord: Only images uploaded directly to Discord can be analyzed.
matchImage.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Please use a smaller image.
matchImage.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use PNG, JPEG, GIF, or WebP.
matchImage.timeout: Image download timed out. Please try again.

matchImageHelp.title: How to Use /match_image
matchImageHelp.description: The `/match_image` command analyzes your uploaded image to find the dominant color and matches it to the closest FFXIV dye. Here are some tips to get the best results!
matchImageHelp.howItWorksContent:
**1. Image Analysis**
- Your image is processed using K-means clustering
- The most dominant color(s) are extracted
- Colors are matched against 136 FFXIV dyes

**2. Dye Matching**
- Uses Euclidean distance in RGB color space
- Returns the closest matching dye(s)
matchImageHelp.tipsContent:
**Crop Your Images**
- Focus on the specific area you want to match
- Remove UI elements and backgrounds

**Choose Good Lighting**
- Take screenshots in well-lit areas
- Avoid dark shadows or extreme highlights

**Avoid Dark Backgrounds**
- Black backgrounds can skew results
- Use neutral, lighter backgrounds when possible
matchImageHelp.commonIssuesContent:
**"I got a dark color but my gear is bright!"**
â†’ Your background is likely dark. Crop the image to just your gear.

**"The match seems off"**
â†’ Multiple colors? The algorithm picks the MOST common color.

**"Can I match a specific part?"**
â†’ Yes! Crop to that exact area before uploading.
matchImageHelp.proTipsContent:
â€¢ Use image editing software to crop before uploading
â€¢ For metallic/shiny gear, results may vary
â€¢ If you know the hex code, use `/match` instead
â€¢ Extract multiple colors with the `colors` option (1-5)
â€¢ Screenshot at 1920x1080 or higher for best quality
matchImageHelp.footer: XIV Dye Tools - Made with love for FFXIV glamour enthusiasts
matchImageHelp.goodExamplesContent:
â€¢ Cropped screenshot of a single chest piece
â€¢ Close-up of dyed armor with neutral background
â€¢ Screenshot taken in bright daylight area
â€¢ Image focused on the color you want to match
matchImageHelp.poorExamplesContent:
â€¢ Full-screen screenshot with lots of UI
â€¢ Character in a dark dungeon or cave
â€¢ Multiple armor pieces with different dyes
â€¢ Image dominated by background colors
matchImageHelp.whenToUseContent:
**Use `/match_image` when:**
â€¢ You have a screenshot and want to find the dye
â€¢ You're unsure of the exact color code
â€¢ You want to match a color from inspiration photos

**Use `/match` when:**
â€¢ You already know the hex color code
â€¢ You need more precise/exact results
â€¢ You're working with color swatches
matchImageHelp.supportedFormatsContent:
â€¢ PNG
â€¢ JPG/JPEG
â€¢ GIF
â€¢ WebP
matchImageHelp.fileLimitsContent:
â€¢ Maximum size: 8MB
â€¢ Processing time: ~1-3 seconds
matchImageHelp.matchQualityRatingsContent:
**Perfect** (0 distance)
**Excellent** (<10 distance)
**Good** (<25 distance)
**Fair** (<50 distance)
**Approximate** (â‰¥50 distance)

*Lower distance = better match*
matchImageHelp.poweredBy: Powered by Photon WASM image processing
